column4: i get this when i try to use my webcam : i get this : Oct 20 17:06:06 mainframe hpiod: unable to ParDevice::Open hp:/par/ANY?device=/dev/parport3: No such file or directory: io/hpiod/ppdevice.cpp 827
I have no clue. A .no internet magazine wrote about it today.
I guess there is no point - just choosing "server" in the normal install would install only the base system.
